24385939,s1,T22,T23,During meiosis, ",Structural Maintenance of Chromosome, (,SMC,) complexes underpin two fundamental features of meiosis: homologous recombination and chromosome segregation.,Not_a_complex

24385939,s8,T11,T19,Our data suggest that the ,Smc5,/,6," complex is required for specific recombination and chromosomal processes throughout meiosis and that in its absence, attempts at cell division with unresolved joint molecules and residual cohesin lead to severe recombination-induced meiotic catastrophe.

,Complex_formation

,Not_a_complex
